section.name: Apache Harmony Code Scanning Tools
section.p: The Apache Harmony project is dedicated to producing a codebase that has clear IP pedigree and protects the IP rights of others. As part of this effort, we are developing and using tools that help us examine code in a more effient way. Below are some tools that we either have created, or are listing to provide awareness. The Apache Harmony project or the ASF does not endorse or promote any of these tools, projects or commercial organizations, and does not make any claims as to suitability, accuracy or dependability.

subsection.name: Apache Harmony Keyword Scanner
subsection.p: Keyword scanning is a simple technique to find "the code you never knew you had." By searching for a set of well chosen keywords (like "copyright", "license" etc), you can discover code that may not be redistributable (you have the license to use by not re-distribute or re-license), or that you didn't want to contribute.
